name: parent-auto-tag
description: Obisidian plugin which will automatically add tags to new files based on their directory structure

scripts.dev: node esbuild.config.mjs 0 && if [ -n "${VAULT_PATH+set}" ]; then cp main.js $VAULT_PATH/.obsidian/plugins/parent-auto-tag/; else echo 'Please set VAULT_PATH variable.'; fi

author: Kadian
